title: Internal causes of Soviet system collapse

content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Considering the period 1953 to 1991, analyze the problems within the Soviet Union that contributed to the eventual collapse of the Soviet system.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
